=== CD Sharing ===
Welcome to the CD Image Sharing Page. Thank you for sharing and spreading freedom.

If you would like to share your copy of Ubuntu CD or the .iso file with other enthusiasts in your city who are not able to download it, please add your details in the table below along with your preferred way of communication. This is also a good way of socializing with fellow Ubuntu users in your city and at the same time spreading the good work.

Please add your details under the relevant city (preferably in alphabetical order).
